name: TEMP (Colesyy)
description:
Temp is a 7-Day Game Jam game for the Games Jobs Live Jam 2021.

The theme was "One Time Use"

You play as test subject #749. Test subjects are put through a number of trials by a mysterious entity. To overcome these trials, all you have to do is find the orange door and exit to the next stage. Use each platform sparingly though, as each time you walk through the orange door all the platforms you used in that stage of the trial will disappear and you must find an alternative path to the exit.
